author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 1/4  Happy to announce we reached an agreement with $XRX re: separation into two independent public companies: https://t.co/KoRmzNkzTb

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 2/4  We believe the separation will greatly enhance value for $XRX shareholders

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 3/4  I applaud and respect Ursula Burns for doing what she believes shareholders want – as @Donahoe_John did with $EBAY and $PYPL

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 4/4  I hope and believe the results will be just as good for $XRX shareholders
